pullRequest.title: Mgmt: refactor deprecated function in Sql
pullRequest.bodyText:
In sql server: all withNew*** removed, due to there are define***
In sql database: refactor edition to new sku flow
.withSku(ServiceObjectiveName.DW100) // withSku(new Sku().withName("DW100"))
.withMaxSizeBytes(maxSizeBytes)
previously
.withEdition(DatabaseEdition.DATA_WAREHOUSE)
.withServiceObjective(ServiceObjectiveName.DW100)
.withMaxSizeBytes(maxSizeBytes)
In elastic pool: only change some name in edition flow
.withSku("GP_Gen5", 2)
.withDatabaseMinCapacity(0)
.withDatabaseMaxCapacity(2)
.withStorageCapacity(34359738368L)
previously
.withEdition(ElasticPoolEdition.STANDARD) // can only for BASIC STANDARD or PREMIUM
.withDatabaseDtuMin(0)
.withDatabaseDtuMax(2)
.withStorageCapacity(34359738368L)

commit.message: remove deprecated function in sql server
remove simple withSku, will add with enum later
add unit test for sku generation

nodes.bodyText:
This might better return a new Sku object.
Else user might do DatabaseSku.HYPERSCALE_HS_GEN5_80.toSku().withTier(...) to get the underlying Sku modified.
Just curious, does anyone has a non-null size?
